parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.72

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sensors

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable/disable given sensor

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''enableVehicleSensor''' [componentName, state]

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> componentName : [[String]] - The component's name (can either be it is "real name" or it is className)

</value></part><part><name>p3 </name>=<value> state: [[Boolean]] - component state [on/off]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> [[vehicle]] [[player]] [[enableVehicleSensor]]   ["PassiveRadarSensorComponent",false]; // disables passive radar </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[listVehicleSensors]], [[isVehicleSensorEnabled]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
